text:
Oh...!
Great job until the end, Hana.

Yeah,
but Producer, thank you for everything until the end.

Every day was exhausting,
so we couldn't have fun like on a school trip...

But thanks to you, Producer,
we managed to do our best and it became a fun memory.

...I see.
I'm glad it turned out to be a good camp.

Oh, but──
How about we share a secret before we finish?

Yeah, since we're here...
...Is that okay?
Well, it's not not okay but...

I... you know,
every morning, before everyone gathers──

I secretly watched as Producer earnestly did radio
calisthenics, it was something I looked forward to every day!

A-A secret...?
Isn't that more like my secret...!?

But you know,
it's also a part of the fun memories!
